name: NOVADREAM
description:
In a cold galaxy where stars are dying, a magician and their friend search for light.

CONTROLS:
WASD/Arrow keys to move.

Space/Enter to talk.
Space to use magic spell.

Developed by... 

  • Programmer: Dopeytaterchip
  • Game & Narrative Design: ninthcompanion
  • Art: Baradian, Yosbruno, Ghosyboid, ninthcompanion
  • Sound: Lysander, Vanstesan

  • https://freesound.org/people/joelaudio/
  • https://freesound.org/people/lmbubec/

Thanks for playing!
